name: I'm a Chopstick!
description:
I'm a Chopstick is a 2 player co-operative game where each player control 1 chopstick to move the food to the bowl and solve puzzles together! Have tons of cooperative fun in this casual and fun game!

Controllers are necessary right now, and there is no single player mode. We will add keyboard controls and single player mode in the future.

Downloads contain both mac and windows builds in a zip file
